login.title: Login
login.welcomeMessage: Sign in to manage your registrations for Course des Impressionnistes
login.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Create your team manager account
register.passwordHint: At least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
register.success: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNeedsNumber: Password must contain at least one number

verify.title: Verify Your Email
verify.subtitle: Enter the verification code sent to your email
verify.success: Email verified successfully! Redirecting to login...
verify.expiredCode: Verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
verify.resendSuccess: Verification code sent! Check your email.
verify.resendError: Failed to resend code. Please try again.

form.clubPlaceholder: Leave empty to use your club
form.clubHint: Leave empty to use team manager's club
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

validation.licenseInvalid: License number must be alphanumeric and 6-12 characters

card.cannotDeleteAssigned: Cannot delete a member assigned to a boat

list.title: Crew Members
list.search: Search by name or license number...
list.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

boat.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
boat.multiClubWarning: Multi-club crew detected - seat rental fees apply
boat.assignCrewFirst: Please assign crew members to all seats first
boat.noEligibleRaces: No eligible races found for this crew composition
boat.checkCrewComposition: Check crew member ages and genders

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: Select boats to pay for
payment.description: Select the boats you want to pay for and proceed to checkout

noBoats.title: No Boats Ready for Payment
noBoats.description: You don't have any boats ready for payment. Complete your boat registrations first.

payment.noBoatsReadyDescription: Complete your boat registrations to proceed with payment

checkout.title: Secure Checkout
checkout.subtitle: Complete your payment securely with Stripe
checkout.noSelectionDescription: Please select boats to pay for before proceeding to checkout

errors.stripeInit: Failed to initialize payment system. Please refresh the page.
errors.unexpectedStatus: Unexpected payment status. Please contact support.
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load payment data. Please try again.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.message: Your payment has been processed successfully. Your boats are now registered and paid.
success.receiptInfo: A receipt has been sent to your email address.
